title: Change share options
content:
When in an app if I want to share something (for example a picture or video clip), if I click on share it brings up some suggested contacts and suggested apps to use to share.

If I select a particular app, that app is moved up the popularity list, but I cannot see a way to add a particular contact - All the contacts shown seem quite random, and not people I frequently share stuff with in fact one suggested contact is someone who I haven't contacted for months).

Is it possible to amend the list?
